#summary MyFaces Integration Test
#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

- A Integration test unit for JSF (MyFaces implementation). In this case, the creation of a managed bean is tested: ("testBean").



= Details =

{{{

@JettyServiceConfiguration(webApplication="src/main/resources/webapp/myfaces")
public class IntegrationMyFacesEmbeddedTest extends AbstractMyFacesIntegrationTest {

	@Test
	public void ManagedBeanCreationCheck() throws Exception {
		assertRuntimeConfigNotNull();
		assertManagedBeanNotNull("testBean");
	}
}

}}}
